translations: 陶罐；陶制盖碗食品；沙锅

sentences.sentence: A special set dinner, with goose liver terrine, scallop, Turkey, cheese and Yule log will be load at 480 Rmb. French Champagne will be at the special price of 480 per bottle and 80 per glasses.
sentences.translation: 鹅肝酱、干贝、火鸡、干酪加上圣诞柴将以优惠价格480元为您献上，法国香槟酒特惠价格为每瓶480元，每杯80元。
